descripcion:
• 2-BDC Representatives (Agents) (30)

    We’re looking for reliable, dedicated, and ready to work individuals!

    The job responsibilities are to provide support to the company’s sales team by gathering intel of prospective clients and scheduling appointments for them to speak with a salesperson.

    Requirements:

    Advanced English

    Laptop or computer with windows 10.

    10MB+ of internet connection

    Noise cancelling headset with mic

    Reliable Electricity

    Dominican Cédula Only

    Must live in Santiago or nearby areas since you’ll be working on our site eventually.

    Benefits:

    Online, paid training

    Schedule: 9am – 6pm and 11:00 am to 8:00 pm Monday to Friday, Saturdays 9 to 1pm

    Performance incentives

    Health insurance

    Law benefits

    Salary $28,000 monthly
